oai_dc:dc.dc:title: College Capers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Events; Performances; Students; Musical revues & comedies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Singing was a large part of Christian Brothers College life in the 1950s, as evidenced by this performance in the College Capers.
